document_data.name: Winter Blossom
document_data.mainbody:
'''Winter Blossom''' was the [[lemur]] [[familiar]] of the [[Shou]] matriarch [[Lady Feng]].

{{Quote|Lady Feng? Are you there?|[[Ruha]] speaking to Winter Blossom.}}
document_data.Description: The black fur on the lemur's face formed the shape of a mask around its black eyes. His hands had similar black fur, and his long tail had ringed stripes of white.
document_data.Abilities: While Winter Blossom held a special connection to Lady Feng, he could only with others by a series of chitters and growls.
document_data.History: When Lady Feng was abducted by the [[black dragon|black]] [[dracolich]] [[Hethcypressarvil]] in the {{YearlinkName|1364}}, Winter Blossom was left along in her apartment at the [[Ginger Palace]]. The poor creature was discovered by the [[Harpers]] agent [[Ruha]], who nicknamed it "Chalk Ears".
